source.@value:
pipeline "Training"
stage 0 match either
rule "Route - Training"
stage 75 match either
stage 50 match either
rule "Parse - UTM-KV"
rule "Parse - Apache"
rule "Context - Always True"
end

rule "Context - Always True"
when
  true
then
  set_field(
    field : "rule_demo",
    value : "With great power comes great responsibility",
    clean_field : false
  );
end

rule "Route - Training"
when
    has_field("log_pack")
then
    route_to_stream(
        name: "Training Logs"
        );
end
